name: cupdate
description: cupdate is a tool for automatically checking and updating containers, with support for Docker and container environments. It is designed for efficient maintenance using a simple CLI interface for updates and notifications.
features: Automatic Updates: Check for container updates automatically. Stay current effortlessly.
Docker Support: Works seamlessly with Docker environments. Native integration.
Update Notifications: Get alerts when new versions are available. Never miss updates.
CLI Interface: Simple command-line tools for automation. Script-friendly operation.
Efficient Maintenance: Reduce manual update checking time. Streamlined operations.
Self-Hosted: Manage container updates on your infrastructure. Complete control.
